title: Handkerchief, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: plain weave, bobbin lace
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Keith Kane from the estate of Mrs. Robert B. Noyes
description: Handkerchief of linen with wide border of Valenciennes lace in design of curving band with floral ornaments.
